welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Merriam, the charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport serves all commercial flights and houses the airport's amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
